definition.text: used when speaking to someone you love

meaning.translation: در هنگام صحبت کردن با کسی که خیلی دوستش دارید استفاده میشه

definition.text: an amount of food or drink that you put into your mouth at one time

meaning.translation: لقمه ، جرعه

examples.text: Michael told his story between mouthfuls.
mouthful of
Betty drank a mouthful of beer.
He took a mouthful of his pudding.

definition.text: a long word or phrase that is difficult to say

meaning.translation: یک کلمه یا عبارت طولانی که گفتنش سخته

examples.text: Her real name is a bit of a mouthful, so we just call her Dee.

definition.text: to speak angrily to someone, often swearing at them

meaning.translation: با عصبانیت با کسی حرف زدن (اغلب فحش دادن به او)

definition.text: to say a lot of true and important things about something in a few words

meaning.translation: گفتن چیزهای واقعی و مهم زیادی در مورد چیزی دیگر در چند کلمه

definition.text: vivid memories, dreams, descriptions etc are so clear that they seem real

meaning.translation: واضح ، روشن

examples.text: I’ve got vivid memories of that summer.
He had a vivid picture of her in his mind.

definition.text: an ability to imagine unlikely situations very clearly

meaning.translation: تصور واضح و روشن

definition.text: vivid colours or patterns are very bright

meaning.translation: روشن

examples.text: his vivid blue eyes

definition.text: a meal or party during which food is cooked on a metal frame over a fire and eaten outdoors

meaning.translation: یک وعده غذایی یا مهمانی که در طول آن، غذا روی توری فلزی و بر روی آتش پخته می شود و در فضای باز خورده می شود

examples.text: We had a barbecue on the beach.

definition.text: a metal frame for cooking food on outdoors

meaning.translation: توری کباب

definition.text: to cook food on a metal frame over a fire outdoors

meaning.translation: کباب کردن ، پختن غذا روی یک توری فلزی بر روی آتش در فضای باز

examples.text: barbecued chicken

definition.text: someone’s ability to remember things, places, experiences etc

meaning.translation: حافظه

examples.text: memory for
She has a terrible memory for names.
from memory
The pianist played the whole piece from memory.
in your memory
The image has remained in my memory ever since.

definition.text: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

meaning.translation: خاطره

examples.text: memory of
She talked about her memories of the war.
He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
When I saw the pictures, the memories came flooding back (= I suddenly had many memories about something ) .

definition.text:
a) the part of a computer where information can be stored
b) the amount of space that can be used for storing information on a computer

meaning.translation: آ) حافظه کامپیوتر که در اطلاعات ذخیره می شوند ب) مقدار حافظه ای که برای ذخیره سازی اطلاعات در یک کامپیوتر می تواند مورد استفاده قرار بگیرد

examples.text: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
128 Mb of memory
Personal computers now have much increased memory capacity.

definition.text: during the time that people can remember

meaning.translation: در حافظه مردم (در طول مدت زمانی که مردم می توانند به یاد بیاورند)

examples.text: the worst floods in living memory(= since the earliest time that people now alive can remember)
It’s certainly the best England team in recent memory.
The disaster was within the memory of many men still working at the station.

definition.text: if something is done or made in memory of someone, it is done to remember them and remind other people of them after they have died

meaning.translation: به یاد کسی (که از دنیا رفته)

examples.text: a statue in memory of those who died in the war
She set up a charitable fund in her father’s memory.

definition.text: the way you remember someone who has died

meaning.translation: یاد و خاطره کسی که از دنیا رفته

examples.text: She died over 40 years ago but her memory lives on (= people still remember her).
to somebody’s memory
There’s a bench to his memory in the local park.

definition.text: when you spend some time remembering the past

meaning.translation: وقتی که زمانی رو صرف به یاد آوردن گذشته می کنی

examples.text: She returned to her old school yesterday for a trip down memory lane.

definition.lexUnit: somebody’s memory is playing tricks on them
definition.text: used to say that someone is remembering things wrongly

meaning.translation: کسی داره چیزهایی رو به اشتباه به یاد میاره

examples.text: My memory must be playing tricks on me; I’m sure I put that book on the desk.

definition.text: something that solves a problem

meaning.translation: راه حل ، چیزی که مشکلی رو حل می کنه

examples.text: Robinson called the proposal a quick fix (= a temporary or easy solution) of limited value.

definition.text: to have a problem that is difficult to solve

meaning.translation: دچار شدن به مشکلی که حلش سخته

examples.text: We’re going to be in a real fix if we miss that bus.
That’s put us in a fix.

definition.text: an amount of something, especially an illegal drug such as heroin, that you often use and badly want

meaning.translation: مقداری از چیزی به ویژه یک ماده مخدر غیرقانونی مانند هروئین که شخص اغلب مصرف می کنه و بدجور می خوادش

examples.text: addicts looking for a fix
I need my fix of caffeine in the morning or I can’t think.

definition.text:
a)to find out exactly where someone or something is
b)to understand what someone or something is really like

meaning.translation: آ) فهمیدن اینکه کسی یا چیزی دقیقاً کجاست ب) فهمیدن اینکه کسی یا چیزی واقعاً چه جوریه

examples.text: He peered out, trying to get a fix on the enemy’s position.
I couldn’t seem to get a fix on the situation.

definition.text: something that has been dishonestly arranged

meaning.translation: چیزی که به صورت فریب کارانه ای از قبل ترتیب داده شده

examples.text: People think the election was a fix.

definition.text: to repair something that is broken or not working properly

meaning.translation: تعمیر کردن

examples.text: to repair something that is broken or not working properly
He’s outside fixing the brakes on the car.

definition.text:
a) to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change
b) if two or more companies fix the price for a particular product or service, they secretly agree on the price they will charge for it, in order to keep the price high and make more profit. This practice is illegal

meaning.translation: آ) یک حد تعیین کردن برای چیزی تا تغییر نکنه (به ویژه قیمت ، هزینه و غیره) ب) توافق کردن چند شرکت برای بالا نگه داشتن قیمت یک محصول به طور مخفیانه تا سود بیشتری ببرند (این عمل غیرقانونی است)

examples.text: fix something at something
The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
Rent was fixed at $1,750 per month.
The government accused the two companies of fixing petrol prices.

definition.text: to decide on a particular time etc when something will happen

meaning.translation: تعیین کردن یک ساعت ، تاریخ ، مکان و غیره برای چیزی

examples.text: Have you fixed a date for the wedding yet?

definition.text: to make arrangements for something

meaning.translation: تدارک چیدن برای چیزی

examples.text: ‘So when do I get to meet them?’ ‘Tomorrow, if I can fix it.’
fix (it) for somebody to do something
I’ve fixed for you to see him this afternoon at four.

definition.text: to attach something firmly to something else, so that it stays there permanently

meaning.translation: محکم متصل کردن چیزی به چیز دیگر برای اینکه همیشه همونجا بمونه

examples.text: fix something to/on something
The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.

definition.text: to prepare a meal or drinks

meaning.translation: آماده کردن غذا یا نوشیدنی

examples.text: I’ll watch the kids and you fix dinner.
fix somebody something
Can I fix you a snack?
Terry fixed herself a cold drink and sat out on the balcony.

definition.text: to find a solution to a problem or bad situation

meaning.translation: پیدا کردن راه حل برای یک مسئله یا وضعیت بد

examples.text: The government seems confident that environmental problems can be fixed.

definition.lexUnit: fix your attention/eyes/mind etc on somebody/something
definition.text: to think about or look at someone or something carefully

meaning.translation: معطوف کردن

examples.text: Aziz tried to fix his mind on the job at hand.
Every eye was fixed on the new girl.

definition.lexUnit: fix somebody with a stare/glare/look etc
definition.text: to look directly at someone for a long time

meaning.translation: زل زدن به کسی ، مستقیماً نگاه کردن به کسی برای مدت طولانی

examples.text: Rachel fixed him with an icy stare.

definition.text: to make your hair or make-up look neat and attractive

meaning.translation: حالت دادن به موها یا آرایش کردن به نحوی که خیلی مرتب و جذاب به نظر بیان

examples.text: Who fixed your hair for the wedding?
Hold on. Let me just fix my face (= put on make-up ) before we go out.

definition.text: to do a medical operation on a cat or dog so that it cannot have babies

meaning.translation: انجام دادن یک عمل جراحی بر روی یک گربه یا سگ تا دیگه نتونه بچه دار بشه

definition.text: to arrange an election, game etc dishonestly, so that you get the result you want

meaning.translation: مهندسی کردن یک انتخابات ، یک مسابقه و غیره (به طور فریب کارانه ای تدارک چیدن برای اینکه نتیجه مدنظر خودت رو بدست بیاری)

examples.text: Many suspected that the deal had been fixed in advance.

definition.text: to use a chemical process on paintings, photographs etc that makes the colours or images permanent

meaning.translation: استفاده کردن از یک فرایند شیمیایی بر روی نقاشی ها ، عکس ها و غیره که باعث میشه رنگ ها و عکس ها ماندگار بشن

definition.text: used to say that you will punish someone you are angry with

meaning.translation: حساب کسی رو رسیدن (مجازات کردن ، تنبیه کردن)

examples.text: If anybody did that to me, I’d fix him good.

definition.text: to be preparing to do something – used in some parts of the US

meaning.translation: آماده شدن برای انجام کاری

examples.text: I’m fixing to go to the store. Do you need anything?

definition.text: if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat

meaning.translation: کباب کردن ، پختن غذا با قرار دادن اون روی یک توری فلزی و قرار دادن این توری بر روی یا زیر حرارت مستقیم

examples.text: Grill the bacon until crisp.
swordfish grilled over charcoal

definition.text: to ask someone a lot of questions about something

meaning.translation: سؤال پیچ کردن (پرسیدن سؤالات خیلی زیاد در مورد چیزی)

examples.text: grill somebody about/on something
She never grilled her husband about his work.

definition.text: a part of a cooker in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below

meaning.translation: بخشی از یک غذاپز که در آن حرارت زیاد از بالا به غذایی که روی یک قفسه فلزی  قرار دارد اعمال می شود تا غذا بپزد

examples.text: Pop it under the grill for five minutes.

definition.text: a flat frame with metal bars across it that can be put over a fire, so that food can be cooked on it

meaning.translation: توری کباب

definition.text: a place where you can buy and eat grilled food

meaning.translation: محلی که در آنجا می توان غذای کباب شده خرید و خورد

examples.text: the Tribeca Bar and Grill

definition.text: a grille
an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

meaning.translation: جشنواره (فیلم ، نمایش ، موسیقی و غیره)

examples.text: festival of
the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts

definition.text: a special occasion when people celebrate something such as a religious event, and there is often a public holiday

meaning.translation: عید

examples.text: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian calendar.

definition.text: a large meal where a lot of people celebrate a special occasion

meaning.translation: یک مهمانی غذای (به معنی: یک مهمانی که در آن غذا سرو می شود ، در فارسی معادلی برای آن نداریم) بزرگ که در اون عده زیادی یک مناسبت خاص رو جشن می گیرند

examples.text: a wedding feast
The king promised to hold a great feast for all his people.

definition.text: a very good large meal

meaning.translation: یک غذای خیلی خوشمزه و زیاد

examples.text: all the ingredients for a spaghetti feast
midnight feast(= a meal eaten secretly at night by children )

definition.text: an occasion when there are a lot of enjoyable things to see or do

meaning.translation: یک موقعیت که در اون چیزهای لذت بخش زیادی برای دیدن یا انجام دادن وجود داره

examples.text: feast for
Next week’s film festival should be a real feast for cinema-goers.
The play is also a visual feast.

definition.text: a day or period when there is a religious celebration

meaning.translation: عید مذهبی

examples.text: the feast day of St. Francis

definition.text: to eat a lot of a particular food with great enjoyment

meaning.translation: خوردن مقدار زیادی از یک غذای خاص با لذت زیاد

examples.text: We feasted on chicken and roast potatoes.

definition.text: to look at someone or something with great pleasure

meaning.translation: نگاه کردن به کسی یا چیزی با لذت زیاد

examples.text: If you like luxury cars, feast your eyes on these.

definition.text: to eat and drink a lot to celebrate something

meaning.translation: خوردن و نوشیدن زیاد برای جشن گرفتن چیزی

definition.text: a US, Canadian, or Australian dollar

meaning.translation: یک دلار

examples.text: He owes me ten bucks.
The movie is about a group of men trying to make a buck (= earn some money ) as male strippers.
big/mega bucks(= a lot of money )
Using celebrities in advertising is guaranteed to pull in big bucks.
make a fast/quick buck(= make some money quickly, often dishonestly )

definition.text: used to say that a particular person is responsible for something

meaning.translation: مقصر بودن کسی

examples.text: The buck stops firmly with the boss.

definition.text: to make someone else responsible for something that you should deal with

meaning.translation: کسی دیگر را مسئول کاری کردن که خودت باید انجامش بدی

definition.text: to feel or look very healthy, happy, and beautiful

meaning.translation: احساس سلامتی، شادی و زیبایی کردن یا اینجور به نظر رسیدن

definition.text: a male rabbit, deer, and some other male animals

meaning.translation: یک خرگوش نر، یک گوزن نر، یا جنس نر از بعضی حیوان های دیگر

definition.text: a young man

meaning.translation: یک مرد جوان

definition.text: if a horse bucks, it kicks its back feet into the air, or jumps with all four feet off the ground

meaning.translation: لگد زدن یا پریدن اسب

definition.text: to suddenly move up and down, or backwards and forwards, in an uncontrolled way

meaning.translation: ناگهان جا به جا شدن به بالا و پایین یا عقب و جلو

examples.text: The plane bucked sharply.

definition.text: to oppose something in a direct way

meaning.translation: مخالفت کردن

examples.text: He was a rebel who bucked the system (= opposed rules or authority ).
Unemployment in the area has bucked the trend by falling over the last month.
buck against
Initially, he had bucked against her restraints.

definition.text: to make someone feel more happy, confident, or healthy

meaning.translation: کسی را خوش حال تر ، با اعتماد به نفس تر یا سالم تر کردن

examples.text: He was bucked by the success he’d had.
She gave me a tonic which bucked me a little.

definition.text: not wearing any clothes

meaning.translation: کاملاً لخت

definition.text: to interrupt a conversation by saying something that adds more detail

meaning.translation: یک مکالمه را قطع کردن با گفتن چیزی که جزییات بیشتری را اضافه می کند

examples.text: with
Other committee members chipped in with suggestions.
‘It won’t be easy,’ Jeff chipped in.
I’d just like to chip in, Bill, if I might.

definition.text: if each person in a group chips in, they each give a small amount of money so that they can buy something together

meaning.translation: دنگ دادن (به معنی: مقداری پول دادن تا چند نفری با هم بتونن یه چیزی بخرن)

examples.text: We all chipped in to buy Amy a graduation present.
chip in (with) something
Fifty-two people in the music industry each chipped in $250 apiece.

definition.text: the letters and packages that are delivered to you

meaning.translation: نامه ها و بسته هایی که به شخص تحویل داده می شود

examples.text: You shouldn't read other people's mail.
He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ).
He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ).
hate mail (= letters from people who hate you )

definition.text: the system of collecting and delivering letters and packages

meaning.translation: اداره پست

examples.text: The mail here’s really slow and unreliable.
The product will be sold mainly through the mail.
in the mail
I’ll put the check in the mail tomorrow.
by mail
Did you send the document by mail?
registered/express/first-class etc mail
I sent my application by registered mail.
Most reports are sent via internal mail (= a system of sending documents to people inside the same organization ).

definition.text: messages that are sent and received on a computer

meaning.translation: پیام هایی که در یک کامپیوتر ارسال و دریافت می شوند ، نامه الکترونیکی

examples.text: I check my mail a couple of times a day.
She's just received another mail message from them.

definition.text: armour made of small pieces of metal, worn by soldiers in the Middle Ages

meaning.translation: زره ساخته شده از قطعات کوچک فلزی که سربازان در قرون وسطی می پوشیدند

definition.text: to send a letter or package to someone

meaning.translation: ارسال کردن یک نامه یا بسته

examples.text: mail something to somebody
The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.

definition.text: to send a document to someone using a computer

meaning.translation: ارسال یک فایل به کسی با استفاده از یک کامپیوتر ، ایمیل کردن

examples.text: mail something to somebody
Can you mail it to me as an attachment?

definition.text: another name for The Daily Mail

a) a long thin piece of potato cooked in oil
b) a thin flat round piece of food such as potato cooked in very hot oil and eaten cold

meaning.translation: آ) یک قطعه باریک و دراز سیب زمینی سرخ شده در روغن ب) یک قطعه نازک ، صاف و گرد از غذایی مانند سیب زمینی که در روغن خیلی داغ سرخ شده و به صورت سرد مصرف میشه

examples.text: fish and chips
a bag of chips
a bag of potato chips

definition.text: a small piece of silicon that has a set of complicated electrical connections on it and is used to store and process information in computers

meaning.translation: یک قطعه کوچک الکتریکی که برای ذخیره سازی و پردازش اطلاعات در کامپیوترها استفاده می شود

examples.text: the age of the silicon chip
chip technology

definition.text: a small piece of wood, stone, metal etc that has been broken off something

meaning.translation: یک قطعه کوچک از چوب ، سنگ ، فلز و غیره که از چیزی جدا شده

examples.text: Wood chips covered the floor of the workshop.
a chocolate chip cookie (= one that contains small pieces of chocolate )

definition.text: a small hole or mark on a plate, cup etc where a piece has broken off

meaning.translation: یک سوراخ کوچک یا علامتی روی یک بشقاب ، فنجان و غیره که محل شکستگی و جدا شدن تکه ای از آن است

examples.text: chip in
There’s a chip in this bowl.

definition.lexUnit: have a chip on your shoulder
definition.text: to easily become offended or angry because you think you have been treated unfairly in the past

meaning.translation: براحتی ناراحت یا عصبانی شدن چون که فکر می کنی در گذشته باهات ناعادلانه رفتار شده

definition.text: in a serious or difficult situation, especially one in which you realize what is really true or important

meaning.translation: در یک موقعیت جدی یا سخت

examples.text: When the chips are down, you’ve only got yourself to depend on.

definition.lexUnit: be a chip off the old block
definition.text: to be very similar to your mother or father in appearance or character

meaning.translation: خیلی شبیه به مادر یا پدرت بودن (در ظاهر یا شخصیت)

definition.text: a small flat coloured piece of plastic used in games such as poker or blackjack to represent a particular amount of money

meaning.translation: یک قطعه پلاستیکی کوچک ، صاف و رنگارنگ که در بازی هایی مثل پوکر به عنوان مقدار مشخصی پول استفاده می شود

definition.text: a hit in golf, or a kick in football or rugby, that makes the ball go high into the air for a short distance

meaning.translation: ضربه چیپ ، یک ضربه در گلف ، فوتبال یا راگبی که باعث میشه توپ مسافت کوتاهی رو در هوا طی کنه

definition.text: to be in a situation in which you no longer have any hope of improvement

meaning.translation: در موقعیتی بودن که دیگه امیدی برای بهبود اوضاع نداری

definition.text: if you chip something, or if it chips, a small piece of it breaks off accidentally

meaning.translation: به طور اتفاقی شکستن چیزی به نحوی که تکه کوچکی از اون جدا بشه

examples.text: Gary fell and chipped one of his front teeth.
He chipped a bone in his knee and was carried off the pitch.
These plates chip really easily.
chip off
The paint had chipped off the gate.

definition.text: to remove something, especially something hard that is covering a surface, by hitting it with a tool so that small pieces break off

meaning.translation: جدا کردن چیزی به ویژه چیزی سخت که سطحی را پوشانده با ضربه زدن به آن با یک ابزار به نحوی که تکه های کوچکی از آن جدا شود

examples.text: Archaeologists were carefully chipping away at the rock.
Chip out the plaster with a steel chisel.

definition.text: to hit a golf ball or kick a football or a rugby ball so that it goes high into the air for a short distance

meaning.translation: چیپ زدن در یک ورزش (به معنی: ضربه زدن به توپ در گلف ، فوتبال یا راگبی به نحوی که توپ مسافت کوتاهی رو در هوا طی کنه)

examples.text: United scored just before half-time when Adcock cleverly chipped the ball over the keeper.

definition.text: to cut potatoes into thin pieces ready to be cooked in hot oil

meaning.translation: بریدن سیب زمینی به تکه های نازک تا آماده سرخ شدن در روغن داغ بشه

definition.text: to put a microchip in an animal, person, or thing to identify or give information about them

meaning.translation: قرار دادن یک میکروچیپ در یک حیوان، انسان یا چیزی برای اینکه اون رو شناسایی کنه یا اطلاعاتی در مورد اون به ما بده

definition.text: to come closer to a place

meaning.translation: نزدیک شدن

examples.text: She began to feel nervous as she neared the house.
The ship was nearing the harbour.

definition.text: to come closer to being in a particular state

meaning.translation: نزدیک شدن

examples.text: The work is nearing completion.
He’s 55 now, and nearing retirement.

definition.text: to come closer to a particular time

meaning.translation: نزدیک شدن

examples.text: He was nearing the end of his stay in India.

definition.text: if a time nears, it gets closer and will come soon

meaning.translation: نزدیک شدن

examples.text: He got more and more nervous as the day of his departure neared.

definition.text: only a short distance away from someone or something

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: It’s a beautiful house but it’s 20 miles away from the nearest town.
We can meet at the pub or in the restaurant, whichever’s nearer for you.

definition.text: almost a disaster, collapse etc

meaning.translation: تقریباً

examples.text: The election was a near disaster for the Conservative party.

definition.text: the thing you have that is most like a particular type of thing

meaning.translation: نزدیک ترین چیز/معادل به چیزی

examples.text: He’s the nearest thing to a father I’ve got.

definition.text: soon

meaning.translation: در آینده نزدیک

examples.text: They promised to contact us again in the near future.

definition.text:
a)if something you succeed in doing is a near thing, you manage to succeed but you nearly failed
b)used to say that you just managed to avoid a dangerous or unpleasant situation

meaning.translation: آ) نزدیک بود که شکست بخوره ب) نزدیک بود که اتفاق بدی بیفته

examples.text: They won the championship, but it was a near thing.
That was a near thing – that truck was heading straight for us.

definition.text:
a)when a bomb, plane, car etc nearly hits something but does not
b)a situation in which something almost happens, or someone almost achieves something

meaning.translation: آ) وضعیتی که یک بمب، هواپیما، خودرو و غیره خیلی نزدیک بود که بخوره به چیزی ولی نخورده ب) موقعیتی که در اون نزدیک بود چیزی اتفاق بیفته یا کسی چیزی رو بدست بیاره

examples.text: a near miss between two passenger aircraft over the airport

definition.text: an amount to the nearest £10, hundred etc is the number nearest to it that can be divided by £10, a hundred etc

meaning.translation: به نزدیک ترین مضرب 10 ، 100 و ... (مثلاً 2347 به نزدیک ترین مضرب 100 میشه 2300 یا مثلاً به نزدیک ترین مضرب 1000 میشه 2000)

examples.text: Give me the car mileage to the nearest thousand.

definition.text:
a) a relative who is very closely related to you such as a parent
b) someone’s family – used humorously

meaning.translation: آ) خویشاوند نزدیک مانند پدر یا مادر ب) خانواده

examples.text: The death of a near relative is a terrible trauma for a child.

definition.text:
a) used to describe the side of something that is closest to where you are
b) used when talking about the parts of a vehicle to mean the one that is closest to the side of the road when you drive

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: the near bank of the river
The headlight on the near side isn’t working.

definition.text: only a short distance from a person or thing

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: They live near London.
I’m sure they live somewhere near here .
They moved house to be nearer the school.
near to
a hotel near to the beach
She told the children not to go near the canal.
I’m warning you – don’t come any nearer !
We heard voices as we drew near the village.

definition.text: soon before a particular time or event

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: I didn’t remember to phone until near the end of the week.
near to
I’ll give you a ring a bit nearer to Christmas.
They should send us more details nearer the time of the concert.

definition.text: almost doing something or almost in a particular state

meaning.translation: نزدیک به انجام کاری یا حالت خاصی

examples.text: The work is now near completion.
A lot of the women were near tears.
We are no nearer an agreement than we were six months ago.
near to
He was near to panic as he scrambled out of the building.
She was near to crying.
He seemed to know that he was near to death.

definition.text: almost at a particular amount or level

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: Inflation is now near 10%.
He looked nearer fifty than forty.
near to
Unemployment is now near to its all-time low.
Strawberries are near the top of the list.

definition.text: if something is near something else, it is similar to it

meaning.translation: نزدیک ، شبیه به هم

examples.text: His story was near enough the truth for people to believe it.
near to
They say that love is very near to hate.
It may not be an exact replica but it’s pretty damn near.

definition.text: almost perfect, impossible etc

meaning.translation: تقریباً

examples.text: a near impossible task

definition.text: if an event is drawing near, it is nearly time for it to happen

meaning.translation: نزدیک شدن ، تقریباً زمان چیزی رسیدن

examples.text: The day of his interview was drawing near.

definition.text: used to say that something is very nearly true or correct

examples.text: The repairs will cost us £1,000, as near as damn it.

definition.text: used to say that something is nearly true or correct

meaning.translation: تقریباً ، حدوداً

examples.text: The full cost comes to £3,000, near enough.
It’s eleven o'clock, near enough.
All three car parks were full, near enough.

definition.text: used before an adjective or adverb to say that something is definitely not true

meaning.translation: این عبارت قبل از یک صفت یا قید استفاده می شود برای اینکه بیان کنیم که گزاره ای اصلاً درست نیست

examples.text: That’s nowhere near enough money!
The job wasn’t anywhere near finished.

definition.text: if one person or thing does not come near another one, it is not at all as good as the other one

meaning.translation: قابل قیاس نبودن (به معنی: اصلاً به خوبی کسی یا چیزی نبودن)

examples.text: None of the other word processing programs comes near this one.

definition.lexUnit: somebody will not go near somebody/something
definition.text: if someone will not go near a person or thing, they dislike or are frightened of them and will not speak to the person or use the thing

meaning.translation: نزدیکش هم نمیشه (به معنی: از اون شخص یا چیز بدش میاد یا ازش می ترسه بنابراین با اون شخص حرف نمی زنه یا از اون چیز استفاده نمی کنه  )

examples.text: He refused to go near a doctor.
He made up his mind never to go near a motorcycle again.

definition.lexUnit: so near and yet so far
definition.text: used to emphasize that someone very nearly achieved or got something

meaning.translation: این عبارت برای این منظور استفاده میشه که تأکید کنیم کسی خیلی نزدیک بود که چیزی رو بدست بیاره

definition.text: a solid yellow food made from milk or cream that you spread on bread or use in cooking

meaning.translation: کره

definition.lexUnit: butter wouldn’t melt in somebody’s mouth
definition.text: used to say that someone seems to be very kind and sincere but is not really

meaning.translation: این عبارت برای این منظور استفاده میشه که بیان کنیم ضخصی به نظر می رسه که خیلی مهربان و صادق است ولی در واقع اینطور نیست

definition.text: to spread butter on something

meaning.translation: کره کشیدن روی نون و غیره

examples.text: buttered toast

definition.text: a scientific test done to find out how something reacts under certain conditions, or to find out if a particular idea is true

meaning.translation: آزمایش

examples.text: experiment with/in/on
experiments with alcohol-fuelled cars
experiments on sleep deprivation
by experiment
Many small birds guide themselves by the stars, as has been verified by experiment.

definition.text: a process in which you test a new idea or method to see if it is useful or effective

meaning.translation: آزمایش یک ایده یا روش (که ببینیم مفید یا مؤثر است یا نه)

examples.text: experiment with/in/on
an experiment in state socialism

definition.text: to try using various ideas, methods etc to find out how good or effective they are

meaning.translation: آزمایش کردن ایده ها، روش ها و غیره (برای اینکه بفهمیم چقدر خوب یا مؤثر هستند)

examples.text: experiment with/on/in
He experimented with lighter-than-air flight.
The teacher provided some different materials and left the children to experiment.

definition.text: to do a scientific test to find out if a particular idea is true or to obtain more information

meaning.translation: آزمایش کردن

examples.text: experiment with/on
I would defend the right of scientists to experiment on animals.

definition.text: to try doing something to find out what it feels like, for example having sex or using illegal drugs

meaning.translation: امتحان کردن چیزی برای اینکه بفهمی چه حسی داره مثلاً امتحان کردن یک ماده مخدر

examples.text: experiment with
She admitted she had experimented with cocaine.

definition.text: a bird that looks like a large chicken and is often eaten at Christmas and at Thanksgiving

meaning.translation: بوقلمون

definition.text: the meat from a turkey eaten as food

meaning.translation: گوشت بوقلمون

examples.text: roast turkey

definition.text: an unsuccessful film or play

meaning.translation: یک فیلم یا نمایش ناموفق

definition.text: to talk seriously about details, especially in business

meaning.translation: خیلی جدی در مورد جرییات حرف زدن (به ویژه در مورد کسب و کار)

definition.text: a country which is mainly in west Asia but partly in southeast Europe, between the Mediterranean and Black Seas . Population : 80,694,485 (2014). Capital : Ankara. Until the early 20th century, Turkey was the centre of the large Ottoman Empire, whose capital city was Istanbul, Turkey’s largest city. It became a republic in 1923, and its first president was Kemal Ataturk, who made great changes to make Turkey a more modern country. Turkey is a member of NATO and has asked to become a member of the EU.

meaning.translation: کشور ترکیه

definition.text: the end of an activity or of a period of time

meaning.translation: پایان

examples.text: At the close of trade, the Dow Jones index was 1.92 points down.
The monsoon season was drawing to a close (= ending ).
The event came to a close (= finished ) with a disco.
Finally the meeting was brought to a close (= ended ).

definition.text: used in street names for a road that has only one way in or out

meaning.translation: در نامگذاری خیابان ها استفاده میشه برای خیابانی که فقط یک راه ورودی یا خروجی داره

examples.text: Take a left turn into Brown’s Close.

definition.text: the area and buildings surrounding a cathedral

meaning.translation: ناحیه و ساختمان های اطراف کلیسای اصلی اون ناحیه

definition.text: to shut something in order to cover an opening, or to become shut in this way

meaning.translation: بستن ، بسته شدن

examples.text: Would you mind if I closed the window?
She closed the curtains.
Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
Beth closed her eyes and tried to sleep.
She heard the door close behind her.

definition.text: to move the parts of something together so that there is no longer a space between them

meaning.translation: بستن

examples.text: Anne closed her book and stood up.

definition.text: if a shop or building closes, or you close it, it stops being open to the public for a period of time

meaning.translation: بستن ، بسته شدن

examples.text: The shops close at six.
Harry usually closes the store completely when he goes on vacation.

definition.text: if a company, shop etc closes, or you close it, it stops operating permanently

meaning.translation: تعطیل شدن/کردن

examples.text: We have reluctantly decided to close the factory.
The shop closed down some time last year.

definition.text: to end or to make something end, especially in a particular way

meaning.translation: پایان دادن/یافتن (به ویژه به حالت خاصی)

examples.text: close something with/by etc
I will now close the meeting by asking you to join me in a final toast.
close with
The movie closes with an emotional reunion in Prague.
closing remarks(= something you say at the end of a speech )
In her closing remarks, the judge urged the jury to consider the facts only.

definition.text: to stop having and using a bank account or other financial account

meaning.translation: بستن یک حساب بانکی

examples.text: My husband closed all my credit card accounts without even asking me.

definition.text: to be worth a particular amount of money at the end of a day’s trading (= the buying and selling of shares) on the stock exchange

meaning.translation: ارزش داشتن به اندازه مقدار معینی پول در انتهای یک روز کاری در معامله بورس

examples.text: close at
The dollar closed at 64p against the pound.
close up/down
Their shares closed 27p up (= worth 27p more ).

definition.text: to successfully agree a business deal, sale etc

meaning.translation: بستن یک قرارداد

definition.text: to finish on a particular date

meaning.translation: پایان یافتن

examples.text: Our special offer closes on June 3.

definition.text: to make the distance or difference between two things smaller

meaning.translation: کاهش دادن فاصله یا تفاوت بین دو چیز

examples.text: an attempt to close the gap between the rich and poor
close on
The other car was closing on us fast.

definition.text: to make taking part in an activity or using an opportunity no longer possible

meaning.translation: بستن

examples.text: Bidding for the painting will close on Friday.
The country has now closed its borders to all foreign nationals (= will not let foreigners in ).
The legislation aims to close a lot of legal loopholes.

definition.text: if a subject is closed, you are no longer willing to discuss it

meaning.translation: بسته شدن یک موضوع (به معنی: بیشتر از این نمی خواید در موردش صحبت یا بحث کنید)

examples.text: It was a regrettable incident but I now consider the matter closed.

definition.text: to stop operating permanently

meaning.translation: برای همیشه بسته شدن یا متوقف شدن

examples.text: In 1977 the Skyfame Aircraft Museum closed its doors to the public for the last time.

definition.text: to refuse to think about something

meaning.translation: در مورد چیزی فکر نکردن

examples.text: She wanted to close her mind to the outside world.

definition.text: if someone’s hands, arms etc close around something, or are closed around something, they hold it firmly

meaning.translation: محکم نگه داشتن

examples.text: close (something) around/round/over etc something
Her left hand closed over his arm.
She closed her hand tightly around her bag.

definition.text: if a wound closes, or if someone closes it, the edges grow together again or are sewn together

meaning.translation: بسته شدن یا بستن یک زخم

examples.text: The surgeon closed the incision neatly.

definition.text:
a)if people close ranks, they join together to protect each other, especially because their group, organization etc is being criticized
b)if soldiers close ranks, they stand closer together

meaning.translation: آ) دور هم جمع شدن یا به هم پیوستن افراد برای محافظت از یکدیگر (به ویژه بخاطر اینکه گروه، سازمان و غیره اونها مورد انتقاد قرار داره) ب) نزدیک تر به هم ایستادن سربازان

definition.text: to stop working on something, especially a police operation, because it is not making any progress

meaning.translation: کار روی چیزی را متوقف کردن (به ویژه یک عملیات پلیسی چون که پیشرفتی حاصل نمیشه)

examples.text: Detectives had closed the book on the Hornsey Murders case three years previously.

definition.text: not far from someone or something

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: If you need to buy bread or milk, the closest shop is about a mile away.
close to
Susan sat on a chair close to the window.
I don’t mind where we go on vacation as long as it’s close to a beach.
His eyes were small and close together.
There are several accounts of dolphins living in close proximity to humans (= close to humans ).
The victim had been shot at close range (= from very close ).

definition.text: near to something in time

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: close to
It was close to 1:15 a.m.
close together
Our birthdays are quite close together.

definition.text: seeming very likely to happen or very likely to do something soon

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: close to doing something
The two countries are close to signing a peace agreement.
We’re close to clinching the deal.
close to death/tears/despair etc
The old dog could barely whimper and seemed close to death.
The prosecution’s main witness was close to tears as she described the assault.

definition.text: if two people are close, they like or love each other very much

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: My brother and I are very close.
close to
I felt closer to Rob that evening than ever before.
Fiona and I have always been close friends.

definition.text: very similar to each other

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: close to
When I saw Henry with another woman I felt something close to jealousy.
Fitt was the closest thing to a socialist in the party.
Their newest model bears a close resemblance to (= is very similar to ) that of their rival competitor.

definition.text: looking at, thinking about, or watching something very carefully

meaning.translation: یا دقت ، دقیق

examples.text: take/have/get a close look (at something)
She lifted up Jenny’s silver medallion to take a closer look.
keep a close watch/eye on(= watch someone or something very carefully )
Don’t worry, I’ll keep a close eye on the kids.
You could have improved your answers by closer attention to detail.

definition.text: if a number or amount is close to another number or amount, it is not much higher or lower than it

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: We don’t know the exact figures, but about 10,000 might be a close approximation (= close to the actual figure ).
close to
Inflation is close to 7 percent.

definition.text: finishing or being played, fought etc with both sides almost equal

meaning.translation: نزدیک ، تقریباً برابر

examples.text: It was a close game that could have gone either way.
a close second/third etc(= very nearly first, second etc )
The result is too close to call (= so close that it is impossible to know who will win ).

definition.text: a member of your family such as your brother, sister, parent etc

meaning.translation: خویشاوند نزدیک

examples.text: The wedding was attended by close family only.

definition.text: used when you have only just managed to avoid something bad, dangerous, or embarrassing happening

examples.text: ‘Phew, that was close, ’ Frank said as he swerved to avoid the cyclist.
a close call/thing/shave(= a situation in which something dangerous, embarrassing etc almost happens )
United had a close shave when Liverpool almost scored.

definition.text: very nearly getting, finding, or achieving something

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: close to
At this point, the investigators were closer to the truth than they realized.

definition.text: if two people keep in close contact, they see, talk to, or write to each other often

meaning.translation: ارتباط نزدیک داشتن

examples.text: Text messaging enables people to keep in close contact at all times.

definition.text: relating to a situation in which people work well with each other or talk to each other often

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: He retained very close links with France throughout his life.
What we need now is closer cooperation between the club and supporters.

definition.text: with little or no space around something or between things

meaning.translation: بدون فضا یا دارای فضای کمی در اطراف چیزی یا بین یه سری چیزها

examples.text: The horses are always eager for exercise after the close confinement of the stables.
The shoe is a close fit (= there is no space around the foot ).
I find it difficult to read such close print (= with letters printed so close together ).

definition.text: used to tell someone that they have almost guessed or answered something correctly

meaning.translation: تقریباً درست حدس زدی یا جواب دادی

examples.text: ‘I reckon he must be about 38.’ ‘Close – he was 40 last week.’

definition.text: a remark, statement etc that is close to the bone is close to the truth in a way that may offend someone

meaning.translation: نزدیک به واقعیت به نحوی که ممکنه توهینی به شخص باشه

examples.text: His jokes were a bit close to the bone.

definition.text: used when something someone does or says is almost correct or successful

examples.text: It was close, but no cigar for the Dodgers as they lost to the Reds 4–3.

definition.text: if something that happens is too close for comfort, it is near enough to make you feel nervous or afraid

meaning.translation: تقریباً کافی برای اینکه شخص را دچار اضطراب یا ترس کنه

examples.text: From somewhere too close for comfort came the sound of machine-gun fire.

definition.text:
a)if a remark or criticism is close to home, it makes you feel uncomfortable because it is likely to be true
b)if something unpleasant happens close to home, you are directly affected by it

examples.text: His comments struck unpleasantly close to home.
It’s one thing seeing riots on TV, but when they happen so close to home it’s a different matter.

definition.text: if something happens or is done at close quarters, it happens inside a small space or is done from a short distance away

meaning.translation: اتفاق افتادن داخل یک فضای کوچک یا در فاصله نزدیک

examples.text: The troops had been fighting at close quarters.

definition.text: uncomfortably warm because there seems to be no air

examples.text: The weather that night was hot and close, with a hint of thunder in the distance.

definition.text: unwilling to tell people about something

meaning.translation: پنهان کار

examples.text: close about
You’re very close about your work, aren’t you?

definition.text: not generous

meaning.translation: خسیس

examples.text: close with
You won’t get a penny out of Jack – he’s very close with his money.

definition.text:
a) when the hair on someone’s face is cut very close to the skin
b) a situation in which you only just avoid an accident or something bad

meaning.translation: آ) حالتی که موی صورت کسی از ته (نزدیک به پوست) تراشیده شده باشد ب) وضعیت از بیخ گوش گذشتن خطر

examples.text: Phew, that was a close shave.

definition.text: work that involves looking at or handling things in a very skilful, detailed, and careful way

meaning.translation: کاری که شامل نگاه کردن به چیزها یا سر و کار داشتن با چیزها به نحوی ماهرانه ، با جزییات و دقیق است

examples.text: After years of close work, she could hardly see a thing if it was over a yard away.

definition.text: a close vowel is pronounced with only a small space between the tongue and the top of the mouth
not far away

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: Come a little closer, so you can see better.
Her father lives quite close by.
They were sitting close together on the couch.
A variety of good restaurants are close at hand (= very near ).
James heard footsteps close behind him.
Ronnie sped off, with his brother’s car following close behind .
stay/keep close
We must all stay close.
hold/draw somebody close(= hold someone against your body )
He drew her close to him.

definition.text: from only a short distance away

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: Now that I could see him close up, I saw that he was very attractive.

definition.text: used to talk about a number, amount etc that is almost exact, but not completely

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: a voyage of close on 2,000 miles

definition.text:
a)to almost do something
b)to be almost as good as someone or something else

meaning.translation: آ) نزدیک بود فلان کار رو انجام بدم ب) تقریباً به خوبی کسی یا چیزی دیگر بودن

examples.text: I tell you, I was so mad I came close to hitting her.
She came so close to the finals she must have been bitterly disappointed to go out now.
It’s not as good as his last movie, but it comes pretty close.

definition.text: a situation in which the people competing with each other are almost equal, so neither of them is more likely to win than the other

meaning.translation: یک رقابت نزدیک

examples.text: The upcoming election looks likely to be a close run thing.

definition.lexUnit: close on the heels of something
definition.text: very soon after something else

meaning.translation: خیلی زود بعد از چیز دیگر

examples.text: come/follow close on the heels of something
Yet another scandal followed close on the heels of the senator’s resignation.

definition.text: near to the surface of something

meaning.translation: نزدیک

examples.text: An electric razor doesn’t really shave as close as a blade.

definition.text: to be almost as successful, skilful etc as someone else

meaning.translation: تقریباً برابر بودن با کسی دیگر از لحاظ میزان موفقیت، مهارت و غیره

examples.text: Last season United ran them close both at home and away.

definition.text:
a) your stomach
b) the front part of your body between your chest and your legs

meaning.translation: آ) معده ب) شکم

examples.text: a full belly
She was lying on her belly.

definition.text: the middle part of an animal’s body, near its stomach

meaning.translation: شکم یک حیوان

definition.text: a curved or rounded part of an object

meaning.translation: یک بخش انحنا دار یا گرد از چیزی

examples.text: the belly of a plane

definition.text: having a black, fat, big etc stomach

meaning.translation: دارای یک شکم سیاه، چاق، بزرگ و غیره

definition.text: if a business or company goes belly up, it stops operating because it cannot pay its debts

meaning.translation: تعطیل شدن یک کسب و کار یا شرکت بخاطر اینکه نمی تونه بدهی هاش رو بپردازه

definition.text: to fill with air and become rounder in shape

meaning.translation: پر از هوا شدن و گردتر شدن

definition.text: the liquid containing sperm that is produced by the male sex organs in humans and animals

meaning.translation: منی

definition.text: a cell produced by the sex organs of a male person or animal, which is able to join with the female egg to produce a new life

meaning.translation: اسپرم

definition.text: the liquid from the male sex organs that these cells swim in

meaning.translation: منی

definition.text: a medical measurement of the number of sperm a man has, which shows if he is able to make a woman pregnant

meaning.translation: یک عمل اندازه گیری در پزشکی برای شمارش تعداد اسپرم هایی که یک مرد دارد که نشان می دهد که آیا او قادر به بچه دار شدن است یا نه

definition.text: to mention or speak about someone or something

meaning.translation: اشاره کردن به

examples.text: We agreed never to refer to the matter again.
Although she didn’t mention any names, everyone knew who she was referring to.
as
He likes to be referred to as ‘Doctor Khee’.
by
The hospital now refers to patients by name, not case number.

definition.text: to look at a book, map, piece of paper etc for information

meaning.translation: مراجعه کردن (به معنی: نگاه کردن به یک کتاب، نقشه، تکه کاغذی و غیره برای یافتن اطلاعات)

examples.text: He gave the speech without referring to his notes.

definition.text: if a statement, number, report etc refers to someone or something, it is about that person or thing

meaning.translation: در مورد کسی یا چیزی بودن

examples.text: The figures refer to our sales in Europe.

definition.text: to send someone or something to a person or organization to be helped or dealt with

meaning.translation: ارجاع دادن (به معنی: فرستادن کسی یا چیزی پیش شخصی یا سازمانی تا به اون شخص کمک کنند یا اون چیز رو مورد بررسی قرار بدهند)

examples.text: My doctor is referring me to a dermatologist.
My complaint was referred to the manufacturers.

definition.text: to tell someone where to find information

meaning.translation: ارجاع دادن (به معنی: گفتن به کسی که کجا می تونه اطلاعاتی رو پیدا کنه)

examples.text: Readers are referred to the bibliography for further information.

definition.text: a woman who is sexually attracted to other women

meaning.translation: لزبین ، زن همجنس گرا

definition.text: a building where important cultural, historical, or scientific objects are kept and shown to the public

meaning.translation: موزه

examples.text: the Museum of Modern Art
The museum has an extensive collection of early photographs.

definition.text: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

meaning.translation: البته می دونید ، البته انتظارشو داشتید (این عبارت برای بیان این منظور استفاده می شود که بقیه افراد احتمالاً می دونن که چیزی که داری میگی درسته یا انتظار شنیدنش رو دارند)

examples.text: Well, she won, of course.
You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.

definition.text: used to emphasize that you are saying ‘yes’ when someone asks your permission to do something

meaning.translation: البته

examples.text: ‘Can I ring you back in a minute?’ ‘Yes, of course.’
‘Is it OK if I have another cup of coffee?’ ‘Course, help yourself.’

definition.text: used to emphasize that what you are saying to someone is true or correct

meaning.translation: البته که (به معنی: برای تأکید بر اینکه چیزی که داری میگی راسته یا درسته)

examples.text: ‘Do you really believe her?’ ‘Of course I do!’
‘I hope this idea of yours works.’ ‘Course it’ll work.’

definition.text: used to show that you accept or agree with what someone has just said

meaning.translation: البته (به معنی: این عبارت برای بیان این منظور استفاده میشه که تو چیزی که شخص دیگه داره میگه رو می پذیری یا باهاش موافقی)

examples.text: ‘Don’t get angry. She’s only 13.’ ‘Of course.’
‘The correct answer is 83.’ ‘Oh, yes, of course.’

definition.text: used to emphasize that you are saying ‘no’ to something

meaning.translation: البته که نه (به معنی: این عبارت برای تأکید بر جواب نه به چیزی استفاده می شود )

examples.text: ‘Have you been reading my email?’ ‘Of course not!’
‘Do you mind if I bring a friend?’ ‘No, of course not.’

definition.text:
a) used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it
b) (also course, informal) spoken, used to emphasize that you are saying ‘yes’ when someone asks your permission to do something
c) (also course, informal) spoken, used to emphasize that what you are saying to someone is true or correct

meaning.translation: آ) البته می دونید ، البته انتظارشو داشتید (این عبارت برای بیان این منظور استفاده می شود که بقیه افراد احتمالاً می دونن که چیزی که داری میگی درسته یا انتظار شنیدنش رو دارند) ب) البته ج) البته که(به معنی: برای تأکید بر اینکه چیزی که داری میگی راسته یا درسته)

examples.text: You can pay by cheque, assuming of course you have a valid cheque card.
Of course there are exceptions to every rule.
‘Can I have a word with you?’ ‘Of course.’
‘Can you give me a lift?’ ‘Course, no problem.’
Of course he’ll come!
well/but of course
Well of course I love you.

definition.text: used to say very strongly that something is not true or correct

meaning.translation: البته که نه (به معنی: این عبارت برای تأکید بر جواب نه به چیزی استفاده می شود )

examples.text: He asked his father if it was true. ‘Of course not, ’ Jack said.
‘You don’t mind if I call her?’ ‘No, course not.’

definition.text:
a) a series of lessons in a particular subject
b) a period of study in a particular subject, especially at university

meaning.translation: آ) یه سری درس ها در مورد مبحث خاصی ب) یک دوره مطالعاتی در مورد مبحث خاصی به ویژه در دانشگاه

examples.text: Andy’s doing a one-year journalism course.
course on/in
a course on architecture
I’m taking a course in graphic design.
a degree course in photography

definition.text: a period of time or process during which something happens

meaning.translation: مدت زمانی یا فرایندی که طی اون چیزی اتفاق میفته

examples.text: during/in/throughout/over the course of something
During the course of our conversation, it emerged that Bob had been in prison.
Over the course of the next few years, the steel industry was reorganized.
in the course of doing something
In the course of researching customer needs, we discovered how few families have adequate life insurance.

definition.text: the usual or natural way that something changes, develops, or is done

meaning.translation: روال معمول یا طبیعی (ای که چیزی تغییر می کنه، ادامه پیدا می کنه، رشد می کنه یا انجام میشه)

examples.text: course of
forces that shape the course of evolution
Meeting Sally changed the whole course of his life.
in the normal/natural/ordinary course of events
In the normal course of events, a son would inherit from his father.
take/run its course(= develop in the usual way and reach a natural end )
Relax and let nature take its course.
It seems the boom in World Music has run its course.
Gorbachev changed the course of Soviet history.

definition.text: the general plans someone has to achieve something or the general way something is happening

meaning.translation: روال (به معنی: برنامه های کلی ای که شخصی داره تا چیزی رو بدست بیاره یا روال کلی اتفاق افتادن چیزی)

examples.text: They will go to any lengths to get the White House to change course.
He will steer a middle course between pacifism and revolution.
As long as the economy stays on course, the future looks rosy.

definition.text: an action or series of actions that you could take in order to deal with a particular situation

meaning.translation: یک اقدام یا یک سری از اقدامات (که می تونی انجام بدی تا به یک موقعیت خاص بپردازی و اون رو حل و فصل کنی)

examples.text: I agreed that this was the only sensible course of action.
take/decide on a course
The judge took the only course of action open to him.

definition.text: the planned direction taken by a boat or plane to reach a place

meaning.translation: مسیر حرکت برنامه ریزی شده یک قایق یا هواپیما برای رسیدن به یک نقطه

examples.text: The plane changed course to avoid the storm.
on/off course(= going in the right or wrong direction )
The ship was blown off course.
The aircraft was almost ten miles off course.
She tightened the mainsail while holding the course (= travelling in the same direction as planned ).

definition.text: likely to achieve something because you have already had some success

meaning.translation: در مسیر رسیدن به هدفی (چونکه قبلاً بخشی از مسیر رو طی کردی و موفقیت هایی رو بدست آوردی)

examples.text: on course for
If he wins today, he’s on course for the Grand Slam.
on course to do something
We’re back on course to qualify for the championship.

definition.text: one of the separate parts of a meal

meaning.translation: یکی از چند بخش مجرای یک غذا

examples.text: three-course/five-course etc meal
The ticket includes entry and a four-course meal.
first/second/main etc course
We had fish for the main course.

definition.text: an area of land or water where races are held, or an area of land designed for playing golf

meaning.translation: یک ناحیه زمین یا آب  که در اون مسابقه هایی برگزار می شود یا زمینی که برای بازی گلف طراحی شده

examples.text: a particularly difficult course
an 18-hole course

definition.text: an amount of medicine or medical treatment that you have regularly for a specific period of time

meaning.translation: یک مقدار دارو که برای مدت زمان معینی مرتباً مصرف می کنی یا یک معالجه پزشکی که برای مدت زمان معینی مرتباً تحت درمانش قرار می گیری

examples.text: course of injections/drugs/treatment etc
a course of antibiotics

definition.text: after some or enough time has passed

meaning.translation: در نهایت ، پس از گذشت مدتی ، پس از گذشت زمان کافی

examples.text: She’ll get used to school in the course of time.

definition.text: the direction a river moves in

meaning.translation: مسیر حرکت رودخانه

examples.text: The course of the water was shown by a line of trees.

definition.text: a layer of bricks, stone etc in a wall

meaning.translation: یک لایه آجر، سنگ و غیره در یک دیوار

examples.text: a damp-proof course

definition.text: if a liquid or electricity courses somewhere, it flows there quickly

meaning.translation: به سرعت جریان پیدا کردن

examples.text: Tears coursed down his cheeks.

definition.text: if a feeling courses through you, you feel it suddenly and strongly

meaning.translation: جریان یافتن یک احساس در درونت (به معنی: حس کردن این احساس به طور ناگهانی و قوی)

examples.text: His smile sent waves of excitement coursing through her.

definition.text: to chase rabbits with dogs as a sport

meaning.translation: دنبال کردن خرگوش ها با سگ ها به عنوان یک ورزش

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_1

definition.text:
a) to let someone borrow money or something that belongs to you for a short time
b) if a bank or financial institution lends money, it lets someone have it on condition that they pay it back later, often gradually, with an additional amount as interest

meaning.translation: آ) قرض دادن ب) وام دادن (بانک)

examples.text: lend something to somebody
I lent my CD player to Dave and I haven’t got it back yet.
lend somebody something
The hospital agreed to lend us a wheelchair.
Can you lend me £10 until tomorrow?
The government is trying to encourage the banks to lend more.
lend something to somebody
A lot of banks are unwilling to lend money to new businesses.
lend somebody something
The building society agreed to lend us £60,000.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_2

definition.text: to help someone do something, especially something that needs physical effort

meaning.translation: کمک کردن به کسی برای انجام کاری (به ویژه کار فیزیکی)

examples.text: Can you lend me a hand with this?

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_3

definition.text: to give a situation, event etc a particular quality

meaning.translation: ویژگی خاصی دادن

examples.text: lend something to something
The presence of members of the royal family lent a certain dignity to the ceremony.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_4

definition.text: to listen to someone, especially in a sympathetic way

meaning.translation: گوش دادن به کسی (به ویژه به حالت همدلانه) ، پای درد و دل کسی نشستن

examples.text: He’s always prepared to lend a sympathetic ear.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_5

definition.text: to be suitable for being used in a particular way

meaning.translation: مناسب بودن برای استفاده خاصی

examples.text: None of her books really lends itself to being made into a film.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_6

definition.text: to support or help someone

meaning.translation: حمایت کردن یا کمک کردن

examples.text: The government has now lent its support to the campaign.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_7

definition.text: to make an opinion or belief seem more likely to be correct

meaning.translation: یک عقیده یا باور را محتمل تر کردن

examples.text: The police have new evidence which lends weight to their theory.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle lent / lent / )
title: lend_verb_8

definition.text: to announce publicly that you support something that someone is trying to do

meaning.translation: به طور علنی اعلام کردن که از کاری که شخصی داره تلاش می کنه انجام بده، حمایت می کنی

examples.text: The French prime minister has now lent his name to the protest.

definition.text: to use something that belongs to someone else and that you must give back to them later

meaning.translation: قرض گرفتن

examples.text: Can I borrow your pen for a minute?
borrow something from somebody
You are allowed to borrow six books from the library at a time.
They borrowed heavily  (= borrowed a lot of money ) from the bank to start their new business.

definition.text: to take or copy someone’s ideas, words etc and use them in your own work, language etc

meaning.translation: گرفتن یا کپی کردن ایده ها ، کلمه ها و ... کسی دیگر و استفاده از آنها در کار خودت، زبانی که به کار می بری و غیره

examples.text: borrow something from somebody/something
I borrowed my ideas from Eliot’s famous poem ‘The Waste Land’.
To borrow a phrase  (= use what someone else has said ), if you can’t stand the heat, get out of the kitchen.
borrow from
English has borrowed words from many languages.

definition.text: to worry about something when it is not necessary

meaning.translation: نگرانی غیر لازم داشتن در مورد چیزی

definition.text: the bones of a person’s or animal’s head

meaning.translation: جمجمه

definition.lexUnit: somebody can’t get it into their (thick) skull
definition.text: someone is unable to understand something very simple

meaning.translation: این (چیز ساده) تو کله فلان شخص فرو نمیره

examples.text: He can’t seem to get it into his skull that I’m just not interested in him.

definition.text: to manage to get something that is rare or difficult to get

meaning.translation: بدست آوردن چیزی (که کمیابه یا سخت بدست میاد)

examples.text: How did you come by these pictures?
Jobs were hard to come by.

definition.text: to make a short visit to a place on your way to somewhere else

meaning.translation: سر زدن به جایی (در مسیرت به جایی دیگر)

examples.text: He said he’d come by later.
I’ll come by the house and get my stuff later, OK?

definition.text: a department or group of related departments within a university

meaning.translation: دانشکده

examples.text: faculty of
the Faculty of Law
the Engineering Faculty

definition.text: all the teachers in a university

meaning.translation: مجموعه اساتید یک دانشگاه

examples.text: Both faculty and students oppose the measures.

definition.text: a natural ability, such as the ability to see, hear, or think clearly

meaning.translation: توانایی ذاتی (مثل توانایی دیدن، شنیدن یا فکر کردن)

examples.text: the patient’s mental faculties
in full possession of all your faculties(= able to see, hear, think etc in the normal way )
faculty of
the faculty of sight

definition.text: a particular skill that someone has

meaning.translation: استعداد

examples.text: faculty for
She had a great faculty for absorbing information.

definition.text: the start of a race or a journey

meaning.translation: شروع یک مسابقه یا سفر

examples.text: The horses were in line, ready for the off.

definition.text: from the beginning of something

meaning.translation: از شروع چیزی

examples.text: She was doubtful about the interview from the off.

definition.text: to kill someone

meaning.translation: کشتن

examples.text: The guy who did this ought to be offed.

definition.text: a day, week etc when you are not doing something as well as you usually do

meaning.translation: روزی، هفته ای و ... که کاری که معمولاً انجام میدی رو به خوبی همیشه انجام نمیدی

examples.text: Brian never usually loses his temper – he must be having an off day.

definition.text: a period or season which is not as busy as other times of the year

meaning.translation: یک دوره یا فصل که به اندازه بقیه سال، شلوغ نیست

examples.text: In the off season, there’s hardly anyone staying at the hotel.

definition.text: used to talk about a pair of things such as wheels on a car, to mean the one on the right

meaning.translation: این کلمه برای حرف زدن در مورد یک جفت چیز، مانند چرخ های خودرو، استفاده می شود و اشاره به سمت راستی دارد

definition.text: away from a place

meaning.translation: دور از جایی

examples.text: He got into his car and drove off.
Suddenly they turned off and parked in a side road.
Once we were off the main freeway, the trip felt more like a vacation.
Her husband was off on a business trip somewhere.
Are you ready? Off we go.
I must be off now (= I must leave ).
They were off to Italy (= leaving to go to Italy ) and wanted to make an early start.

definition.text: not on something, or removed from something

meaning.translation: روی چیزی نبودن یا جدا شدن از چیزی

examples.text: Keep off the grass.
As he leaned forward, his hat fell off.
Someone had taken the mirror off the wall.
Take your coat off.
I was trying to scrape the mud off my boots.

definition.text: out of a bus, train, plane etc

meaning.translation: حالت پیاده شدن از اتوبوس، قطار، هواپیما و غیره

examples.text: I’ll get off at the next stop.
Everyone got off the train at Winnipeg.

definition.text: a machine, piece of equipment etc that is off is not working or operating

meaning.translation: خاموش

examples.text: Will someone switch the radio off?
Make sure all the lights are off.

definition.text: not at work, school etc because you are ill or on holiday

meaning.translation: حالت سر کار، مدرسه و ... نبودن بخاطر بیماری یا رفتن به تعطیلات

examples.text: My secretary’s been off with flu for the past week.
Clare had to stay off school because her mother was ill.
You look tired. Why don’t you take tomorrow off?
He needs more time off duty for relaxation and rest.
‘Going to work today, mum?’ ‘No. It’s my day off today.’

definition.text: from someone

meaning.translation: از کسی

examples.text: My brother once borrowed some money off him.
I got this necklace off a woman outside the market.

definition.text:
a) used to say how far away something is
b) used to say how much time there is between now and a future event
c) used to say how likely or unlikely something is

meaning.translation: آ) استفاده میشه برای که بگیم چیزی چقدر دوره ب) استفاده میشه که بگیم چقدر زمان از الان تا یک رویداد در آینده مونده ج) استفاده میشه که بگیم چیزی چقدر محتمل است

examples.text: We could see the cliffs of Shetland about two miles off.
Kara’s home was a long way off across the sea.
With the exams now only a week off, I had to study hard.
Christmas seemed a long way off.
Any kind of peace agreement still seems a long way off.

definition.text:
a) only a short distance away from a place
b) connected to a particular room, area, road etc

meaning.translation: آ) به فاصله کمی از ب) متصل به یک اتاق، ناحیه، جاده و غیره

examples.text: Our hotel was just off the main street.
an island off the coast of France
There’s a small bathroom off the main bedroom.
a narrow street leading off the corner of the square

definition.text: used to say that a price is reduced by a particular amount

meaning.translation: استفاده میشه برای بیان اینکه یک قیمت به مقدار معینی کاهش پیدا می کنه

examples.text: If you buy more than ten, they knock 10% off.

definition.text: if an event which has been arranged is off, it will not now take place

meaning.translation: لغو ، کنسل

examples.text: The wedding’s off.
The race may have to be called off if the bad weather continues.

definition.text: behaviour that is off is rude or is not acceptable

meaning.translation: گستاخانه ، بی ادبانه ، ناپسند

examples.text: She walked out before the end of your lecture, which I thought was a bit off.
Look, I know when someone’s being off with me.

definition.text: used to say how much of something someone has

meaning.translation: استفاده میشه برای بیان اینکه کسی چقدر از یک چیز رو داره

examples.text: be well/badly off for something
The school’s fairly well off for books these days.
How are you off for sports equipment (= do you have enough?)?

definition.text: for short periods but not regularly, over a long period of time

meaning.translation: در دوره های کوتاهی از یک زمان طولانی به صورت نامرتب

examples.text: We’ve been going out together for five years, off and on.

definition.text: no longer wanting or liking something

meaning.translation: دیگه چیزی رو نخوای یا علاقه ای بهش نداشته باشی

examples.text: Toby’s been off his food for a few days.
go off something/somebody
I used to enjoy tennis, but I’ve gone off it a bit now.
She seems to have gone off Mark since he’s grown a beard.

definition.text: no longer taking something such as a drug or medicine

meaning.translation: دیگه مصرف نکردن چیزی مانند مواد مخدر یا دارو

examples.text: The operation was a success, and she’s off the morphine.

definition.text:
a) food that is off is no longer fresh enough to eat
b) used to say that a particular kind of food is not available in a restaurant although it is on the menu

meaning.translation: آ) خراب ، فاسد ب) استفاده میشه برای بیان اینکه یک نوع غذای خاص اگر چه در منو هست، اما فعلاً سرو نمیشه

examples.text: Ugh! The milk’s off.
Do you think the meat’s gone off ?
I’m sorry, the fish pie is off today, sir.

definition.text: not as good as usual

meaning.translation: به خوبی معمول نبودن

examples.text: Sales figures for last year were a little off compared with those of the previous year.

definition.text: not correct or not right

meaning.translation: ناصحیح ، نادرست

examples.text: Our calculations were off.
Guess again. You’re way off (= very far from being correct ).

definition.text: relating to the Moon or to travel to the Moon

meaning.translation: مربوط به ماه یا سفر به ماه

examples.text: studies of the lunar surface
a lunar eclipse

definition.text: a religious person who travels a long way to a holy place

meaning.translation: یک شخص مذهبی که سفری طولانی را برای رسیدن به یک مکان مقدس انجام می دهد ، زائر

examples.text: pilgrims visiting a holy shrine

f2n.heading: Register
f2n.explanation: In everyday British English, when someone is temporarily away from their work or studies, people often say they are off, rather than on holiday . Note, however, that off can also mean that someone is away from their work or studies because they are sick:

definition.text: a time of rest from work, school etc

meaning.translation: تعطیلات (به معنی: زمانی برای استراحت از کار، مدرسه و غیره)

examples.text: The school holidays start tomorrow.
on holiday
I’m away on holiday until the 1st of June.
in the holidays
He came to stay with us in the school holidays.
holiday from
a holiday from her usual responsibilities

definition.text: a period of time when you travel to another place for pleasure

meaning.translation: تعطیلات (به معنی: مدت زمانی که برای تفریح به مکانی دیگر سفر می کنی)

examples.text: We’re going to Spain for our holidays.
on holiday
He caught malaria while on holiday in Africa.
I haven’t had a proper holiday for two years.

definition.text: a day fixed by law on which people do not have to go to work or school

meaning.translation: تعطیلی رسمی

examples.text: The 4th of July is a national holiday in the US.

definition.text:
a)the period between Thanksgiving and New Year
b)the period in the summer when most people take a holiday

meaning.translation: آ) مدت زمان بین دو عید شکرگزاری و سال جدید ب) مدت زمانی در تابستان که بیشتر مردم به تعطیلات می روند

definition.text: to spend your holiday in a place – used especially in news reports

meaning.translation: گذراندن تعطیلات در جایی (این کلمه به ویژه در گزارش های خبری، به این شکل، استفاده می شود)

examples.text: holiday in/at
They’re holidaying in Majorca.

definition.text: to refuse to buy something, use something, or take part in something as a way of protesting

meaning.translation: تحریم کردن

examples.text: We boycott all products tested on animals.

definition.text: an act of boycotting something, or the period of time when it is boycotted

meaning.translation: تحریم

examples.text: They are now trying to organize a boycott.
boycott of/on/against
a boycott on GM crops
He called for a boycott of the elections.

definition.text: to crush something, especially a food that has been cooked, until it is soft and smooth

meaning.translation: له کردن چیزی (به ویژه یک غذای پخته تا وقتی که نرم و صاف بشه)

examples.text: Mash the bananas.

definition.text: potatoes that have been boiled and then crushed and mixed with milk until they are smooth

meaning.translation: سیب زمینی پخته، له شده و مخلوط شده با شیر

examples.text: bangers (= sausages ) and mash

definition.text: a mixture of malt or crushed grain and hot water, used to make beer or whisky

meaning.translation: مخلوطی از مالت (جوانه جو خشک شده) یا غلات آسیاب شده و آب که برای درست کردن آبجو یا ویسکی استفاده می شود

definition.text: a mixture of grain cooked with water to make a food for animals

meaning.translation: مخلوطی از غلات پخته شده با آب برای درست کردن غذایی برای حیوانات

definition.text: a very popular US television programme (1972–82), based on Robert Altman’s film of the same name (1970) about a US army medical camp during the Korean War . Although it treated the subject in a humorous way, it also showed the serious effects that war had on people. The letters stand for ‘ Mobile Army Surgical Hospital ’.
a small piece of something solid, without a particular shape

meaning.translation: تکه کوچیکی از چیزی جامد که شکل خاصی ندارد

examples.text: Strain the custard to remove lumps.
lump of
Melt a lump of butter in your frying-pan.

definition.text: a small hard swollen area that sticks out from someone’s skin or grows in their body, usually because of an illness

meaning.translation: یک ناحیه کوچک، سفت و ورم کرده که از پوست کسی میزنه بیرون یا داخل بدنش رشد می کنه (معمولاً به علت یک بیماری)

examples.text: You should never ignore a breast lump.

definition.text: a small square block of sugar

meaning.translation: حبه قند

examples.text: One lump or two?

definition.text: a feeling that you want to cry

meaning.translation: بغض گلو

examples.text: There was a lump in her throat as she gazed at the child.

definition.text: to accept the bad things that happen and not let them affect you

meaning.translation: پذیرفتن اتفاق های بدی که میفته و اجازه ندی تو رو تحت تأثیر خودشون قرار بدن

examples.text: According to experts, the company took its lumps but is on the road to profitability.

definition.text: someone who is stupid or clumsy

meaning.translation: یک شخص احمق یا دست و پا چلفتی

examples.text: He’s a big fat lump.

definition.text: to accept a situation or decision you do not like because you cannot change it

meaning.translation: پذیرفتن موقعیت یا تصمیمی که ازش خوشت نمیاد چونکه نمی تونی تغییرش بدی

examples.text: They’ve been told: take the lower interest rate, or lump it.
It’s the law so you can like it or lump it.

definition.text: to put two or more different people or things together and consider them as a single group, sometimes wrongly

meaning.translation: در کنار هم قرار دادن چند شخص یا چیز متفاوت و در نظر گرفتن اونها به عنوان یک گروه

examples.text: lump something together
You can’t lump the symptoms together and blame them all on stress.
lump somebody/something in with somebody/something
The danger is that people who pay their bills on time will be lumped in with those that don’t.

definition.text: a serious illness that is caused by a bite from a tick

meaning.translation: یک بیماری خطرناک که توسط نیش کنه ایجاد می شود

definition.text: a medical condition that causes difficulties in breathing

meaning.translation: آسم

definition.text: publicly or formally

meaning.translation: به طور غلنی یا رسمی

examples.text: The new church was officially opened on July 5th.
Nothing has yet been officially announced.
The scheme was officially launched in May.
Has the company officially confirmed the appointment?
the number of officially recognized political parties

definition.text: according to what someone says publicly, even though this may not be true

meaning.translation: برطبق چیزی که شخصی به طور علنی می گوید (اگر چه ممکن است درست نباشد)

examples.text: Officially, the talks never took place.

definition.text: on a particular date

meaning.translation: در یک تاریخ خاص

examples.text: As of August 1, the company had $44 million in long-term debt.

definition.text: from a particular date

meaning.translation: از یک تاریخ خاص

examples.text: As of July, the company will be based in New York

definition.text: something someone says or does that shows that they are very unhappy and need help

meaning.translation: چیزی که شخصی می گوید یا کاری که انجام می دهد که نشان می دهد او خیلی ناراحت است و نیاز به کمک دارد

examples.text: I think taking the pills was a cry for help.

definition.text: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

meaning.translation: دعوت کردن

examples.text: invite somebody to something
Who should we invite to the party?
invite somebody to do something
Gail invited me to stay with her while her husband was out of town.
invite somebody for something
Why don’t you invite her for a drink at the club one evening?
I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.

definition.text: to politely ask someone to do something

meaning.translation: دعوت کردن (به معنی: به طور مؤدبانه درخواست کردن از کسی برای انجام کاری)

examples.text: invite somebody to do something
Anyone interested in contributing articles is invited to contact the editor.

definition.text: to encourage something bad to happen, especially without intending to

meaning.translation: محتمل تر کردن یک اتفاق بد (به ویژه بدون قصد)

examples.text: Any government that sells arms to dictators is inviting trouble.

definition.text: an invitation to a party, meal etc

meaning.translation: دعوت

definition.text: coloured substances that are put on your face to improve or change your appearance

meaning.translation: مواد آرایشی

examples.text: I don’t usually wear much make-up.

definition.text: the make-up of a group or team is the combination of people that are in it

meaning.translation: ترکیب (یک گروه یا تیم)

examples.text: make-up of
We should change the make-up of the team.

definition.text: the qualities that a person has, which form their character

meaning.translation: ویژگی هایی که یک فرد داره که شخصیتش رو می سازه

examples.text: Pride has always been an important part of his make-up.
somebody’s genetic/psychological make-up
a possible link between genetic make-up and criminal behaviour

definition.text: a test that you take in school when you were not able to take a previous test

meaning.translation: آزمون جبرانی در مدرسه
