definition.text: to combine together to form something

meaning.translation: تشکیل دادن

examples.text: Women make up only a small proportion of the prison population.
be made up of something
The committee is made up of representatives from every state.

definition.text: to pretend that something is true in order to deceive someone

meaning.translation: از خود درآوردن (به معنی: تظاهر کردن به اینکه چیزی واقعیت داره برای فریب دادن کسی )

examples.text: I think they’re making the whole thing up.

definition.text: to produce a new story, song, game etc by thinking

meaning.translation: نوشتن یک داستان جدید ، ساختن یک آهنگ جدید، تولید یک بازی جدید و ... با فکر کردن بهش

examples.text: Nick made up a song about them.
When you’re the boss you can make up your own rules.
I’ve given talks so many times that now I just make them up as I go along (= think of things to say as I am speaking ).

definition.text: to prepare something by mixing things or putting things together

meaning.translation: آماده کردن چیزی با مخلوط کردن یا سر هم کردن یه سری چیزها

examples.text: I could make up a bed for you on the sofa.
Can you make up a bottle of milk for the baby?

definition.text: to put make-up (= special coloured substances ) on someone’s face in order to make them look better or different

meaning.translation: آرایش کردن کسی

examples.text: They made him up as an old man for the last act of the play.
One lucky winner will have the chance to be made up and photographed.

definition.text: to add to an amount in order to bring it up to the level that is needed

meaning.translation: اضافه کردن به یک مقدار برای اینکه به حد مورد نیاز برسه

examples.text: I saved as much as I could, and my parents made up the rest.
The company will be forced to pay $6 million to make up the difference.

definition.text: to work at times when you do not usually work, because you have not done as much work as you should

meaning.translation: جبران کردن

examples.text: I’m trying to make up the time I lost while I was sick.
Is it OK if I make the work up next week?

definition.text: to become friendly with someone again after you have had an argument

meaning.translation: دلخوری ها رو فراموش کردن و دوباره صمیمی شدن با کسی که باهاش یه دعوا داشتی

examples.text: with
Have you made up with Patty yet?
Oh come on! Why don’t you just kiss and make up?

definition.text: to produce something from cloth by cutting and sewing

meaning.translation: درست کردن چیزی از پارچه با بریدن و دوختن

examples.text: The dress had been made up to her exact requirements.
make something ↔ up into
I plan on making that material up into a dress.

definition.text: when you spill something, or an amount of something that is spilled

meaning.translation: عمل ریختن مایع به بیرون از ظرفش به صورت اتفاقی یا مقدار مایعی که به این صورت بیرون ریخته

examples.text: the enormous oil spill off the southern tip of the Shetland Islands

definition.text: a fall from a horse, bicycle etc

meaning.translation: عمل افتادن از اسب، دوچرخه و غیره

examples.text: Tyson broke a rib when he took a spill on his motorcycle.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle spilt / spɪlt / especially British English or spilled especially American English )
title: spill_verb_1

definition.text: if you spill a liquid, or if it spills, it accidentally flows over the edge of a container

meaning.translation: تصادفی ریختن مایع به بیرون از ظرفش

examples.text: Katie almost spilled her milk.
spill something down/on/over something
Oh no! I’ve spilt coffee all down my shirt!
spill on/over etc
He slipped and the wine spilled all over the carpet.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle spilt / spɪlt / especially British English or spilled especially American English )
title: spill_verb_2

definition.text: if people or things spill out of somewhere, they move or fall out in large numbers

meaning.translation: بیرون ریختن (به معنی: خارج شدن یا بیرون افتادن افراد یا چیزهای زیادی)

examples.text: spill out/into/onto etc
Crowds from the theatre were spilling onto the street.

inflections: ( past tense and past participle spilt / spɪlt / especially British English or spilled especially American English )
title: spill_verb_3

definition.text: to tell something that someone else wanted you to keep a secret

meaning.translation: گفتن چیزی که شخص دیگه ای از تو خواسته بوده که به عنوان یک راز نگهش داری

inflections: ( past tense and past participle spilt / spɪlt / especially British English or spilled especially American English )
title: spill_verb_4

definition.text: to tell someone all about your private life, or about a personal secret

meaning.translation: با کسی در مورد مسائل خصوصی زندگیت حرف زدن یا رازهای ضخصیت رو به او گفتن

inflections: ( past tense and past participle spilt / spɪlt / especially British English or spilled especially American English )
title: spill_verb_5

definition.text: to kill or wound people

meaning.translation: خون ریختن (به معنی: کشتن یا زخمی کردن آدم ها)

definition.text: to understand what someone is telling you or explaining to you

meaning.translation: فهمیدن ، متوجه شدن (چیزی که شخصی داره بهت میگه یا برات توضیح میده)

examples.text: Sorry, I’m not with you – which room do you mean?
So that’s how the system works. Are you with me?

definition.text: a man who serves food and drink at the tables in a restaurant

meaning.translation: پیش خدمت مرد

definition.text: a woman who serves food and drink at the tables in a restaurant

meaning.translation: پیش خدمت زن

definition.text: an independent organization is not owned or controlled by, or does not receive money from, another organization or the government

meaning.translation: مستقل

examples.text: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
an independent charity
small independent bookshops
independent of
We need a central bank that is independent of the government.
independent school(= one not owned or paid for by the government )
schools in the independent sector
independent television/radio/broadcasting etc(= not owned or paid for by the government )
independent television companies
independent film(= one not made or produced by a large film production company )

definition.text: an independent organization or person is not involved in a particular situation, and can therefore be trusted to be fair in judging it

meaning.translation: مستقل

examples.text: an independent panel of scientists
An independent body  (= group of people who work together ) has been set up to monitor government spending.
There were no independent witnesses to the shooting.
independent inquiry/advice/opinion etc(= carried out by or given by an independent person or organization )
Human rights groups have called for an independent inquiry into the killings.
the results of an independent study

definition.text: an independent country is not governed or controlled by another country

meaning.translation: مستقل

examples.text: India became independent in 1947.

definition.text:
a) confident and able to do things by yourself in your own way, without needing help or advice from other people
b) having enough money to live, without having to ask for help from other people

meaning.translation: مستقل

examples.text: Now that my sons are more independent, I have more time for myself.
an independent young woman
He’s helping other people with spinal injuries to lead an independent life.
independent of
By this age, the child becomes relatively independent of his mother.
It was always very important to me to be financially independent .
independent of
Robert aimed to be independent of his parents by the time he was twenty.

definition.text: when you study on your own, rather than being taught by a teacher

meaning.translation: خودآموزی ، مطالعه یا یادگیری مستقل (بدون کمک گرفتن از یک معلم)

examples.text: The tapes can be used in class or for independent study.

definition.text: someone who has their own income from property, investments etc, so that they do not have to work or depend on anyone else
if one thing is independent of another, the two are not connected, or the second thing does not influence the first

meaning.translation: مستقل

examples.text: independent of
reports from two separate sources entirely independent of one another
Three independent studies all arrived at the same conclusion.

definition.text: an independent politician does not belong to a particular party

meaning.translation: یک سیاستمدار که عضو هیچ حزب سیاسی ای نیست

examples.text: Independent candidates won three seats.

definition.text: the sport of moving down hills, across land in the snow, or on water wearing skis

meaning.translation: ورزش اسکی

examples.text: We’re going to go skiing in Colorado this winter.
cross-country/downhill skiing

definition.text: money that you receive as payment from the organization you work for, usually paid to you every month

meaning.translation: حقوق

examples.text: The average salary for a teacher is $39,000 a year.

definition.text: an expression of thanks to God

meaning.translation: شکر گزاری

definition.text: a public holiday in the US and in Canada when families have a large meal together to celebrate and be thankful for food, health, families etc

meaning.translation: عید شکرگزاری

definition.text: before something happens or is expected to happen

meaning.translation: قبل از ، از قبل ، قبل از همه چیز ، قبل از اتفاق افتادن چیزی

examples.text: I should warn you in advance that I’m not a very good dancer.
Many thanks, in advance, for your help.
six months/a year etc in advance
Book tickets 21 days in advance.
Could you distribute copies well in advance of the meeting?

definition.text: to be more developed or modern than someone or something else

meaning.translation: پیشرفته تر یا مدرن تر بودن

examples.text: Their aircraft were in advance of those used by the US.

definition.text: a change, discovery, or invention that brings progress

meaning.translation: پیشرفت (یک تغییر، کشف یا اختراع که پیشرفت رو به همراه میاره)

examples.text: technological/scientific/medical etc advance
one of the great technological advances of the 20th century
a major advance
advance in
Recent advances in genetics have raised moral questions.
advance on
an advance on previous treatments
the advances made in the understanding of mental handicap

definition.text: forward movement or progress of a group of people – used especially to talk about soldiers

meaning.translation: پیشروی (به ویژه در مورد سربازان)

examples.text: advance on
the enemy’s advance on St. Petersburg

definition.text: money paid to someone before the usual time, especially someone’s salary

meaning.translation: پیش پرداخت

examples.text: a $500 advance
advance on
Krebs decided to ask for an advance on his salary.

definition.text: an attempt to start a sexual relationship with someone

meaning.translation: یک اقدام اغواگرانه برای شروع یک رابطه جنسی با کسی

examples.text: She accused her boss of making advances to her.
The witness said that he ‘went berserk’ when she rejected his sexual advances.

definition.text: an increase in the price or value of something – used especially when talking about the stock exchange

meaning.translation: افزایش قیمت یا ارزش چیزی (به ویژه در هنگام صحبت کردن درباره بازار سهام استفاده میشه)

definition.text: to move towards someone or something, especially in a slow and determined way – used especially to talk about soldiers

meaning.translation: پیش رفتن ، پیشروی کردن (به ویژه به حالت آهسته و مصمم)(به ویژه برای حرف زدن در مورد سربازان استفاده میشه)

examples.text: A line of US tanks slowly advanced.
advance on(= moved towards it in order to attack it )
Troops advanced on the rebel stronghold (= moved towards it in order to attack it ).
advance across/through/towards
The army advanced across the plain.

definition.text: if scientific or technical knowledge advances, or if something advances it, it develops and improves

meaning.translation: پیشرفت کردن

examples.text: Our understanding of human genetics has advanced considerably.
The group’s research has done much to advance our knowledge of the HIV virus.

definition.text: to give someone money before they have earned it

meaning.translation: پیش پرداخت دادن

examples.text: advance somebody something
Will they advance you some money until you get your first paycheck?
advance something to somebody
I advanced $1,500 to Kramer last Thursday.

definition.lexUnit: advance your career/a cause/your interests etc
definition.text: to do something that will help you achieve an advantage or success for yourself or someone else

meaning.translation: انجام دادن کاری که به تو کمک خواهد کرد که امتیاز یا موفقیتی رو، برای خودت یا کسی دیگر، بدست بیاری

examples.text: Jameson agreed to the deal in an effort to advance his political career.

definition.text: if the price or value of something advances, it increases – used especially when talking about the stock exchange

meaning.translation: افزایش یافتن قیمت یا ارزش چیزی (به ویژه در هنگام حرف زدن در مورد بازار سهام استفاده میشه)

definition.text: to change the time or date when an event should happen to an earlier time or date

meaning.translation: جلو انداختن (زمان یا تاریخ چیزی)

examples.text: The meeting has been advanced to ten o'clock.

definition.text: if you advance a film, clock, musical recording etc, or if it advances, it goes forward

meaning.translation: به جلو بردن (فیلم، ساعت، آهنگ و غیره)

definition.text: planning etc that is done before an event

meaning.translation: قبلی (مثلاً: برنامه ریزی قبلی، هشدار قبلی و غیره)

examples.text: We received no advance warning of the storm.

definition.text: a group of people who go first to a place where something will happen to prepare for it

meaning.translation: گروهی از افراد که زودتر از بقیه میرن به جایی که قراره یه چیزی اتفاق بیفته تا براش آماده بشن

definition.text: a copy of a book, record etc that has not yet been made available to the public

meaning.translation: یک نسخه از یک کتاب، موسیقی و ... که هنوز در دسترس عموم قرار نگرفته
